attributes.action: Put a price cap on all dog breeds so we can stop theft and puppy farmers
attributes.additional_details:
Please put a price cap in all dog breeds .
Pet theft and farming and unlicensed breeders are causing misery and pain in the united kingdom .
attributes.background:
Please put a price cap in all dog breeds .
Pet theft and farming and unlicensed breeders are causing misery and pain in the united kingdom .

Violence is extreme now to get our dogs from us .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for setting commercial prices, including for animals.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase regulation of animal sales: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601708
